de.bpmnaftool.view
Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
ViewImpl
public interface View

Interface for the Graphical User Interface. Defines methods to show various frames, dialogs and provides methods to update the view.

Author:
Felix Härer

Method Detail

initialize

void initialize()
initializes the graphical user interface by starting the main frame and loading the start panel

showError

void showError(java.lang.Exception e,
               java.lang.String title)
Shows an error dialog which contains the message of the exception and the given title

Parameters:
e - exception to show
title - title of error

setValidationStatus

void setValidationStatus(boolean isWellFormed,
                         boolean isValid)
Sets the validation and well-formed status. When set to true, the inputOk image is shown, when set to false, the inputNotOk image is shown.

Parameters:
isWellFormed - true if input is well formed, false otherwise
isValid - true if input is valid, false otherwise

showInfo

void showInfo(java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String text)
Shows an info dialog with the given title and text

Parameters:
title - title of dialog
text - text to display in dialog

void showAbout()
shows an about window with information about the tool

addTransformStatusText

void addTransformStatusText(java.lang.String message)
adds transformation status text

Parameters:
message - text to add

setTransformProgress

void setTransformProgress(int percentage)
sets transformation progress to the given percentage

Parameters:
percentage - value from 0 to 100 indicating the progress

showFileDialogInputFile

java.io.File showFileDialogInputFile()
shows the file input dialog

Returns:
the chosen file

showFileDialogOutputFile
